channel.title: Comments on: Guild Wars Factions Weekend

item.title: By: Brinstar
item.dc:creator: Brinstar
item.description: I believe the <em>Guild Wars</em> servers have had about 10 - 12 hours of downtime since the game's release in April 2005. Unfortunately, the information about the last server maintenance downtime on the official website's Network News page is now gone.
item.content:encoded: I believe the Guild Wars servers have had about 10 – 12 hours of downtime since the game’s release in April 2005. Unfortunately, the information about the last server maintenance downtime on the official website’s Network News page is now gone.
